/usr/bin/c++  -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/shadow.dir/src/ShadowMapping.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadow.dir/src/Camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadow.dir/src/DirectionalLight.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadow.dir/src/eventhandling.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadow.dir/src/fileio.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadow.dir/src/gltools.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadow.dir/src/ImagePlaneMesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadow.dir/src/Matrix4x4.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadow.dir/src/Mesh.cpp.o  -o shadow  -lSDL -lGL -lGLU -lX11
